July 13, 2015. Sandra Bland was 28 years old. Three days after being arrested due to a pretextual traffic stop, she was found dead in her cell, ruled suicide. Video came out of the terrible treatment she endured during this usual type of stop. Remember her name #BlackLivesMatter

April 4, 2015. Walter Scott was 50 years old. When pulled over for a traffic stop for a non functioning brake light, Walter ran from the car and was shot in the back. Video surfaced showing that the officer who shot him lied in his report. Remember his name. #BlackLivesMatter
